name: The Worlds Hardest Game
description:
Do you want to try the world's hardest game? Now you can play it, but be aware that it is the impossible game to beat!

This impossible game includes 25 awesome and difficult levels. The first one is easier, but step by step, it will be incredibly hard to complete.

World's hardest game has 2 type of gameplay and the difference is the difficulty of them. With the easy mode, you can navigate by the touch, but with the hard mode, the motion joystick is the way hard to move.

Instructions:

When you see yellow item, first thing you have to take is this one, then please go to the green box to complete the mission.

Your score is a reflection of how many times you have died; the less, the better.

This is the hardest game ever to play!
